item.title: [delta] Thieving Stall
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“matzie, post:4, topic:422645”]that is not greater AND less than… that is an OR you want.

and… hit!=5 is not the same as hit==5… its the exact opposite ~_~
hit!=5 is everything except 5.[/quote]
Ohhhh i see what you mean now, Rep++

tell me what greater than 5 and less that 5 at the same time…
probably mean hit==5?[/quote]
This means 0-4, 6-20
5 is going to deal damage, once i add it.
If you see,[quote=“runescape sucks, post:1, topic:422645”] } else if(hit == 5) { sM("You get caught stealing by Saradomin.");[/quote]
i already have that there.

item.title: [delta] Thieving Stall
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

int randomsteal = misc.random(3) * misc.random(3) + 500; int hit = misc.random(20); if(objectID == 2565 && hit > 5 && hit < 5) { sM("You steal "+randomsteal+" coins from the stall."); addItem(995, randomsteal); addSkillXP(missta, 17); } else if(hit == 5) { sM("You get caught stealing by Saradomin."); }
I used this code for thieving, but when you click on the stall(2565) nothing happens.

I’m stumped, i really do not understand this any.

Read full topic
